column4: Who wrote this specification, what software are you trying to use?
i think gnome-shell is not in ubuntu 10.04
Nope, and gnome should be install by default on desktop. Is this a server?
no, i installed command line system through alternate cd
ubuntu-desktop is a meta-package if you look at the contents it will list the packages
i know but it installs many other applications which i do not want
I said look at the package not install it, it will list all the packages that make ubuntu-desktop including the gnome related packages
do you know how to create an icon in a panel of icewm?
